description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Zenoss Core through 5 Beta 3 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an attribute in a (1) device name, (2) device detail, (3) report name, (4) report detail, or (5) portlet name, or (6) a string to a helper method, aka ZEN-15381 and ZEN-15410.
